parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the clutch pedal bracket can cause the clutch pedal to malfunction, making it difficult or impossible to shift gears, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: The clutch pedal feels loose or unstable
the clutch pedal bracket cracks or breaks
the clutch pedal mounting bracket snaps at the firewall
the clutch pedal moves side to side instead of straight
the vehicle is unable to shift into gear.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the gear shift lever can cause the vehicle to become undrivable, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: The gear shift lever snaps off
the gear shift would not lock in park.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Severe frame rust and corrosion can lead to structural integrity issues, compromising the safety of the vehicle and its occupants. In extreme cases, it can cause critical components to fail, resulting in loss of control or accidents.
symptoms: and detachment of exterior components like bumpers.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Door Closure Issue with Power Windows
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The inability to close doors without rolling down the windows can be a nuisance and may lead to water ingress, noise, and security concerns.
symptoms: requirement to roll down windows to close doors
and necessity to start the car before operating power windows.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering linkage can cause the steering column to lock, making it difficult or impossible to steer the vehicle, which can lead to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: the steering wheel cannot be turned
corrosion is visible on the pitman arm
